name: Rekindled (akkien)
description:
This game was made as an entry for the Weekly Game Jam #168: Pass The Torch. In this game you control a swordsman that fights zombies. Upon death, you become a floating soul that only has 10 seconds before it's life force runs out. As a soul, you can revive inside other bodies laying around on the floor, and also unlock doors depending on the amount of enemies you've slain.

Controls:

Move = WASD / Arrow keys
Run = Shift
Revive = 'F' / 'P'
Unlock = 'Q' / 'O'
Attack = 'K' / 'R' / Left Click
Pause = 'E' / 'Esc'
